entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Rocky Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:02 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Berry Hill 12:30 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: -2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -7.5°C
Wind: ESE 19 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain or ice pellets beginning early in the morning and ending in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of rain showers late in the afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming east 50 gusting to 70 except gusting to 120 along parts of the coast late in the morning and in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Temperature rising to 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning in the evening and ending overnight then 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 120 along parts of the coast in the evening. Wind becoming southeast 50 gusting to 80 near midnight. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023
